div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio xiij
die Decembris Anno quo supra

the samyn day William Wormet
grantit that he sulde comper one friday that next cumis
befor the aldirman ande balyeis within the tolbutht and that day
do that gudmen' ordanis and findis that he suld' do anent ane
Ringe clamit be thomas Waus

the samyn day the aldirman and balyeis assignit friday that
next cumis to alexander gray to do that he aw to do of law till
alexander rede anent jC crovnis clamit be the saide alexander
rede and till vndirly ane assis' the saide say tharanent
and alexander allansone seriand chargit and warnit that saide alexander
gray to comper' the saide day and vndirly the decisione of
ane assis' of the clame of jC crovnis clamyt be the sade
Alexander rede

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xvij die Decembris Anno quo supra

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem quod Willelmus buchane
est legittimus et propinquior heres quondam Roberti buchane
et prepositus et consilii diuersi dederunt thome fyf balliuo in
mandatis ad congnoscendum eundem Willelmum ad terras et animos redditus
sibi Jure hereditario contingen' per decessum dicti quondam patris suj ut
decet filium et heredem burgensem cognosci

the saide day alexander gray was in ane amerciament of the court be his
avne tonge grawnt for the trubulance of alexander rede in worde
and to amend' as of law will and to forber in tyme to cum

the saide say Williame Wormet grantit that he trovit the Ringe
clamit be thome Waus will be gottyn' quhilk the aldirmane
chargit hm to deliuer be Wits Wednisday that next cumis to the said'
thomas

The said day In presens of the aldirman balyeis and the hall court it
was aggreit and finalie concordit betuix alexander rede of petfodellis one that
ane part And' alexander gray one that vthir part In maner and forme
as eftir follouis that is to say the saide alexander gray sal deliuer ande
gyf to the said' alexander rede his bill of compt and rekning of ij serplaris
of woll and his bill of charge gyf it can be gottyn' one Wednisday
that next cumis And' gif the saide alexander rede bes complanteous apon' the
saide alexander gray in ony thingis concerning the saide matir thane the saide
alexander gray sal abid' and vndirly the determinacion decision' and declaracion
of ane assis' vnsuspek the saide Witsonday Wednisday befor the
aldirman and balyeis within the tolbutht but ony dilatour excepcion'
or demawnd' peremptirlie to the kepin' and fulfillinge of the saide
thingis the said partiis ar' oblist and bundin' be thar handis vphaldin
and fathis of thar bodiis but fraude or gile

the samyn day the aldirman and balyeis assignit this wattir malis to the
masonis vndir writin In the first thome prat for half neth of the
mydchingile v li' x s' v d' James colison' iij li' vi s' xi d' and ob'
Androw Wynton' for demi nethis of mydchingile v li' x s' v d' Dauid
matheson' for demi nethis v li' x s' v d' Robert of Culan for j thridpart
iij li' vj s' xi and ob' Dauid menyes eldar for ane auchtan part of the
crovis lij s' Ellen' mureson' and thome hay for j sexpart of the crovis
iij li' vj s' Nannis menyes and elizibeth' blindsell ane auchtan
part and ane sextpart of the crovis iij li' vj s' vij d' and lij s' of this
Instant yeris fischingis

the samyn day it was sufficientlie preuit that the relict of thomas
culane was lauchfullie warnit to comper befor the aldirman and
balyes this day within the tolbutht in the hour' of caus' to her'
and se the witnes and preuis lede be mathow cullan and Androw cullan
his assignay and procuratour agannis hir' lauchfullie producit suorne and
to obek agannis tham as law will tuechinge the arschip clamyt
be the saidis mathow and Androw his assignay pertening to tham be the deces'
of the saide vmquhill thomas cullan

add.foreign: deposiciones testium productos per cullan contra Relictam quondam thome cullan

div.p:
Thir ar the deposicionis of the witnes producit be mathow cullan and Androw
culan his assignay in action depending vndecidit of ayrschipe pertening'
to tham be the deces' of vmquhill thomas Culan thar brothir withhalding'
be agnes club as is allegit

the saide day Jonhne murtour' the first witnes suorne deponit be his aithe
that he duelt with thome of Cullan and he was bodin and clede with
gudis in hous' and vteuthe with hors' and in houshald' with al thingis that
pertenit till ane burges And' he wyst him neuir sell nay thinge till
his enday

Isabell of Cullan deponit be hir aithe that thome of cullan quhome god
assolye hir brothir hed his hous' welbeseyne in ale Inseicht
accordinge till ane burges at his deces' and hed' ane gud matrice
and j gret pott with vthir houshald' according' Ande scho vndirstud
neuir that hir' modir bocht the saidis thomas ayrschipe til his enday

Alexander nachty suorne deponit be his aithe that thome of Cullan in tym'
of his deces' was welbodin' in ale thingis that accordit till ane
burges in houshald' and vteuthe als'uel as ony nichtbur' beside him in the
towne with pottis panis dischis dublaris countaris siluer pecis siluer spvnis mas'
matrice fedir beddis and al vthir gudis and with ij hors smale axis sadill et cetera

the Relict of vmquhill Richerd of cullan concordis with Isabell of cullan
in ale thingis et cetera And' atour sche'sche' overwrites 'we' in different ink. vnderstandis ij goublatis was away
or the saide thomas deces'

Patrik andirsone suorne deponit the gret aithe that thomas cullan the tym'
of his deces' hed ale gudis Inseiche and houshald that efferit ane burges
to have with pecis of Siluer Siluer spwnis masar matrix fedir
beddis pottis pannis dischis dublaris covntaris and al vthir hushalde
ger' and with ij hors' and al riding' ger' according for his person' and hors'
batht wapinnis and vthir defensabill ger'

sere Dauid Waus vicar of banf and curat of abirdene deponit be his
aithe that he was diuers' tymes in thome of Cullanis hous' and
saw it euire well apparalit batht in hall and chamer as
efferit ane burgis hous' to be and was sua the tyme of his extreme
vncion and eftir he was vntyt he saw sere alexander club and his cistir
takand' done the towall burde and vthir ger' and abilyement off
houshald' and saide that that and the vthir stuff thar modir hed' bocht and he
vndirstud' neuer that scho hed' bocht it quhill now he heris sere alexander
sais it is bocht And' atour he saw him haf hors and ridin' geyr'

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xx die Decembris
Anno quo supra

Eodem die plegium porrectum per Andream andirsone contra alexandrum mar' continuatur
cum consensu parcium vsque in feriam quartam proxime sequentem

Eodem die Duncanus straloche seriandus de mandato prepositi et balliuorum
promittit agnetem club relictam quondam thome cullan in Judicio ad comparendum in pretorio
dicti burgi feria quarta proximo sequente hoc causarum ad videndum et audiendum deposiciones
testium productos per partem sibi aduersam videlicet matheum cullan et Andream
cullan' suum assignatum de et super bonis sibi Jure hereditario contingen' racione
decessus quondam dicte thome publicari promulgari et vlterius ut Jura
voluit procedere et Sententiari

Eodem die Isabella Cullan Solempniter protestata fuit pro parte sua bonorum
Jure hereditario quondam thome Cullan fratri suo contingen' empt' vt asseritur
per quondam bone memorie iuretum suam si huiusmodi bonorum emptio valda
inueniatur

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiijo die
Decembris Anno quo supra

Sere alexander club suorne deponit be his aith' that thome of Cullan hede
ane Siluer spwne as he crovit at his deces' and j fedir bede ij blanketis
j coueringe schetis coddis and parte of curtingis j bassy nocht the best j plat
j dische j salsar' j pott j pane j maskfate the troucht quhilk
remanit in the erde and Rottyt j cruk j brandir j gowne j dublat
and j per of hoys' ane hatt ane bonat ane almary quhilk yet
remanis in the sellar Rottyne j lavacar'

The samyn day the aldirman and the consall has ordanit decretit
and deliuerit that the ballieis pas' with Androw cullan assignay to
mathou cullan and mak him be content and pait of all ayrschip
pertening to vmquhill thomas of Cullan eftir the tenor' of the
previs lede and producit tharapon' obefor Ande quhar' Agnes
club has nay gudis to pay the saide airschipe that ordanit
the balyeis to compell ande distrenye hir' coniunctfeftment to the
pament of the saide ayrschipe as thai will ansuer tharfor

the samyn day lindsay harrat comperit befor thomas fyf balye and
schew that he perofferit ane hamyr' barrell of Salmond' full rede and
Suet merchand' gude to Dauid menyeis eldar quhilk he awcht him
as in ane ak maide tharapon obefor is contenit protestand' gif
he wald' nocht resaue it It suld' turne him to nay preiudice

The samyn day thomas of mar' producit ane acquitance subcriuit
with handis of Jonhne of Culan Jonhne moire and Richerd of hill of
ane serplar of woll resavit fra Jonhne of mar' in the name of thomas
mar' his fadir and alexander rede grantit that the saidis iij personis was
his factouris

The samyn day it was Statutit and ordanit be the aldirman and
the consale that gyf thar happinnis ony strubulance betuix
Androw branche and James colisone in tymes to cum the party strubular
sal pay tene stane of waxe vnforgevin to the haly blud licht
and Sanct nicholes werk eftir the strubulance be knavyn' befor
the aldirman and the balyeis

the samyn day it was statut' be the aldirman and consal that gyf
euir Duncan portar seruand' to James colisone committ violent strubulans
apone ony brethir of gilde or apone Androw branche he salbe
expellit the towne eftir the strubulance be knavin befor the aldirman and
balyeis

The samyn day It was deliuerit and decretit be ane Suorne assis'
alexander chamer of murchile forspekar of the samyn that alexander gray sal ger'
alexander Rede of petfodellis be ansuerd' of his Siluer of ij serplaris
of woll or ansuer' him his self ande wrangis that he has nocht
done it

the saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' alexander cha
mer of murchill forspekar of the samyn that alexander of mar sal deuyd'
him of Anny mar' his douchtir wyf to Androw andirson and of hir'
gudis gyf thar be ony and the saide alexander mar' is quyt of the wranguis'
Intrometinge of al gudis pertening to the saide Androw and the borghe strekyt
apon' the saide alexander mar' be the saide Androw for the wranguis' Intro
metinge of his gudis fundyn' of nayne availe

head.note: This heading is at the top of the page.

div.p:
Curia capitalis burgi de Abirdonensis tenta in pretorio
eiusdem per balliuos decimo die mensis Januarij Anno
Domini Millesimo quadringentesimo nonogesimo quo die sectis vocatis
et curia affirmata absentes patent in Rotulo secte

the samyn day Robert blinsell gaf his gluff in takyne of ane streys' to
Jonhne colisone procurator for Jonhne of Knollis for pament of xv s' of annuell
aucht to the saide Jonhne of Knollis of ane wast lande lyand' in the gallou
gate pertening to the saide Robert processit be the saide Jonhne to this the
ferde day of proces' in defalt of pament of the saide annuell quhilkis
xv s' the saide Robert grantit to pay to the said' Jonhne of Knollis or
his procurator within xv dais or ellis ples' him tharfor

The samyn day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' alexander chamer of murchill
forspekar of the samyn that William gareache sal gyf the half of the fre siluer
of the fraucht of the hulk that he has takin vp to Robert blindsell
thomas mar and Androw Wenton' awnaris of the samyne And'
quhat costis Siluer that is vntakyne vp of the saide fraucht the sadis
William and awnaris sall pas' to giddir ande rays' it

the samyn day it was fundyne and deliuerit be ane suorne assis' that
Williame andirson' in carnfethill is awand' to Jonhne gray xv s'

the samyn day the aldirman and diuers' of the consale ordanit the balyeis
to pas' ande gyf possession' to lindesay harrald' of Samekile of
William moris lande as ane barrell of Salmond' is of vaile eftir
the tenor' of the akis of the kingis parleament

the saide day Jonhne brogane grantit to deliuer toWilliam Wormet
the hernes swerde and buklar' eftir the tenour of ane decret gevin
tharapon'

the samyn day it was fundin decretit and deliuerit be ane suorne
assis' alexander chamer of murchile forspekar of the samyn that gyf
Dauid menyeis will sueir' that he gaf nocht to William gareauche
eldar quyt the ladyne that he suld' haue resavit in beruik in his
schipe quhen the said' William deliuerit the Salmond' in skarisburghe
and that he gaf him xx s' one onwartis of the fraucht hamwart fra
beruik tile abirdene the saide William acht to mak seruice to the
saide Dauid eftir the tenor of the writ maide betuix tham tharapon'
And' the said' Dauid to mak him pament of his fraucht eftir the
tenor of the samyn And' the said Dauid deponit the aithe eftir the
tenour and deliuerance of the assis' for the quhilkis the said' William was
adiugit in the wrang' and aw to mak seruice to the said' Dauid eftir
the tenor' of the writ maid' tharapon' and he to mak him pament of his
fraucht eftir the tenour of the samyn

the samyn day comperit Duncan lundoris In presens of the court and opinly
schew that he behud' to Sell his lande for vphald and sustentacion'
of his persone in his gret neid' And' perofferit him redy to Sel it
tile ony of his nerrast frendis befor ale vthiris

the saide day the aldirman balyeis chargit and ordanit philp Dunbrek
Duncan straloche and alexander allanson officiaris to pas' and warne Alexander
gray to comper befor thame to morne in the tolbutht in the hour' of caus'
to ansuer' till the borghe strekit apon' him be alexander rede becaus'
he was warnit to comper this day and comperit nocht

div.head: Nomina assise ad Inquisicionem Johannis gilespy
div.p:
Alexander chamer de murchill Alexander rede thomas prat Willelmus blinsele
Johannes Wormet Jacobus Colison Andreas Culan Junior Willelmus futhes
Willelmus andirson senior Andreas murray senior magister Richardus crafurd'
alexander angouson' Johannes portar Johannes Durvarde et alexander Scrogis Jurati
dicunt quod quondam Robertus gilespy pater Johannis gilespy latoris presencium
obiit vltimo vestitus et sastitus ut de de feodo ad pacem et fidem
domini nostri Regis de vno crofto Jacente prope fontem Sancte marie virginis
inter croftum heredum quondam petri Kymdy ex australi ex vna et terram siue
croftum fratrum carmelitarum ver ex boreali partibus ex altera et de vna particata
terra Jacente in vico viridi inter terram quondam Johannis gregory ex boriali
et terram anteriorem hered' quondam Willelmi modan ex australi partibus ex altera
Et de vna terra Jacente in vico castri ex australi parte eiusdem
vici inter terram Dauid matheson ex orientali et terram heredum quondam
Willelmi malisone ex occidentali et communionem viam Regiam versus boriam exten'
ad torrentem Sancte trinitatis versus austrum Et dictus Johannes est legittimus et propinquior heres
dicti quondam patris suj de dictis terris / et legittime etatis Et valent per annum xx s' et tantum
valuerunt tempore pacis Et tenetur in capite de Suppremo domino nostro Rege per
seruicium burgagium Et nunc existitunt in manibus domini nostri Regis in defectu heredis Jus suum
non prosequentis

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Johannes stirueling capellanus
ac procurator altaris beate Katherine virginis in ecclesia beate nicholaij de
abirdene et protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu quinque s' sibi
et dicto altari annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico
viridi inter terram alexandri chamer de murchil ex boriali et terram altaris beate
marie magdalene ex australi ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo
presentauit in Curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus Willelmo cumynge
Willelmo belty et philippo Dunbrek seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram magister alexander fyf capellanus ac procurator altaris
beate marie virginis infra ecclesiam parochialem beate nicholaij de abirdene
situati et protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu ij s' sibi et dicto altari
annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta quondam Johannis club Jacente in le
grene ex occidentali parte aqueductus inter terram eiusdem quondam Johannis ex australi
ex vna et terram quondam alexandri Kyntor ex boreali partibus ex austra altera
ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos ballivis in sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam secundo die huius
processus testibus Willelmo cuminge Willelmo belty et philippo Dunbrek
seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram honorabilis vir henricus leithe de bernis
et protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu vj s' sibi annuatim debit' de quadam terra
vasta Jacente in vico furcarum inferiore ecclesie ex boreali parte eiusdem vici inter terram
alexandri sanquhar' ex australi et terram Jacobi Kennarty ex orientali ad quam terram
accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo
presentauit in curia tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus Jacobo crake
Eduardo top et alexandro allansone seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram henricus leithe de bernis et
protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu v s' sibi annuatim debit' de
quadam terra vasta Jacente in futy inter terram Alexandri murray Junioris
ex australi et terram quondam findelay fores' ex boreali ad quam terram
Accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et ballivis lapides quos
balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus
Testibus Jacobo craik Eduardo top et alexandro allansone seriando

blinsel Eodem die accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno annuo Redditu
quinque s' sibi annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in futy inter terram
Andree murray Junioris ex boreali ex vna et terram quondam alexandri fraser ex australi partibus ex
altera Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus
Testibus Willelmo gray Willelmo fraser et Andrea nachty seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Johannes Kynnymond' capellanus ac procurator
altaris beate Katherine infra ecclesiam parochialem cathedralem abirdonensis situati et protestatus
fuit pro vno annuo Redditu quinque s' sibi et eidem altari annuatim debit' de duabus
quadam terris vastis Jacentibus in le greyne inter terram heredum quondam Johannis thome ex
australi ex vna et croftum fratrum predicatorum ex boreali partibus ex altera Ad quas terras
accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in
Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus thoma
barry thoma hall et Andrea nachty seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Willelmus andirson' Jacobi et protestatus fuit pro
vno annuo Redditu decim s' de terra Jacente in grene inter terram quondam Johannis favsid versus austrum
et terram Andree masone ex boreali ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo
die huius processus testibus Waltero mernys Johanne Walcar et Andrea nachty seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Willelmus andirson' Jacobi protestatus fuit pro vno annuo Red
ditu vij s' sibi annuatim debit' de terra quondam Johannis fawsid' Jacente in le grene inter terram altaris
Sancti Johannis evangeliste versus austrum et terram thome quhit quondam Johannis Davison' ex boreali ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit in curia
tanquam primo die huius processus testibus Waltero menys Johanne Walcar et Andrea nachty seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus matheus nicholson' capellanus ac
procurator altaris beati petri apostolorum principis infra ecclesiam parrochialem beati nicho
laij de abirdene situati et protestatus fuit pro vno annuo Redditu Sex s' sibi et
dicto altari annuatim debit' de vasta terra quadam Jacente in vico furca
rum ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram magistri alexandri Waus ex australi
ex vna et terram Johannis myll ex boreali partibus ex altera Ad quam terram
accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis
in Sacculo presentauit in Curia cumque primo de huius processus Testibus
Willelmo cuminge Willelmo belty et philippo Dunbrek seriando

the samyn day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Dauid
matheson' forspekar that Robert ouchterles is Souerte to William quhit
for xlvj s' and viij d' for arthour forbes as he was obefor quhilkis the
balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per thomam Rolland de et super recupera
cione proprietatis et possessionis cuiusdam terre vaste Jacentis infra dictum burgum
in vico furcarum ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram Dauid prat ex australi
et terram Eduardi cope ex boriali in defectu solucionis vnius annuj Redditus
quinque s' dicto thome a longo tempore debit' et non Solut' vnde dictus thomas
peciit a ballivis secundum formam suj processus precedentis Juris et iusticie complementum Tunc
Curia mature auisiata decreuit quod prefatus thomas possessionem et proprietatem
dicte terre legittime recuperauit in defectu solucionis dicti annuj Redditus Et hoc ex ore
Johannis Williamsone Judicatoris Curie pro Judicio data fuit teste Curia

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiiij die Januarij anno
quosupra

the samyn day Androu lammyngton' said' he hed frede thome
Wodman of borrougange that he was in to androw murray
for cowy Jonhnesone Ande gyf the said' thomas was nocht fred' he grantit
to fre and releywe him tharanent And' in continent alexander allanson' at commavnd'
of the balyes chargit be his wande the said' thomas Androw to remane within
the tolbutht quhil he releuyt the said' thomas of the borrougane forsaid'

the said' day Androu lammynton' oblist him be the fatht of his body to pay
aucht stane of woll gude and sufficient merchande gude quhit and cleyn' as
efferis of the richtuis' wechtis of abirdene In parte of pament of ane gret' Some
restand' vnpait to be pait at the next beltane and falyeinge tharof to pay tene
s' Scottis money for Ilkan stane that beis vnpait at the said' terme to Androw
murray eldar and he drew his hande landis and gudis to the balyeis for the pament
of the samyn but fraud' and gile

Eodem die Agnes andirsone sponsa Walteri Steuarte fecit constituit creauit
et nominauit patricium andirsone suum legittimum et Indubitum procuratorem ad respondendum Johanni
Kyntor suo filio de et super bonis Jure hereditario eidem contingen' ac in omnibus
aliis actionibus querelis et debatis ipsam concernentibus promitten' de Rato et
grato in vberiore forma procuratorij et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xv die
Januarij anno quo supra

The samyn day Androw Waus lauchfully callit to ansuer' to the borghe'
strekit apone him be gilbert Waus of many for the wranguis'
haldin fra him of tene markis tuk to preyf the said' tene
markis pait to the said' gilbert ande askit ane lauchfull day
to preyf his pament And' the balyes riplie avisit with avys' of
the court and consent of the said' partiis assignit monunday next eftir
candilmes'day hereftir to the said' Androw to preyf befor thame
within the tolbutht in Jugement as efferis the said' tene markis
pait And' the said' Androw drew to the balyeis his landis and gudis
to pay the said' tene markis the said' day and he falyet in his preyf

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvij die Januarij Anno quo
supra

the samyn day it was fundyn' be ane assis murtho glenmaluyn
forspekar of the samyn that huchon' bowar sal pay to thome Waus iiij
evyn' bowis or the price of tham extendinge Ilkan pece iij s' or xxx d'
quhilk the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law
Eodem die Katherina buchan conuicta per assisam pro perturbio Symonis gardin'
Eodem die dicta Katherina conuicta pro perturbio coniugis eiusdem Symonis
Eodem die Ipsa Katherina conuicta fuit pro perturbio j coniugis Johannis Westland' et cetera

the samyn day James Colison clerk of ane schip callit Jonet keruell
of the veeris grantit him pait of all gudis that he hed' in the saide schipe
Ande he j trovit nay merchande of abirdene was planteous nor wantit nay gudis
that thai lade in the schipe forsaid' Ande forthir Wictellone Jacobi mastire
vndir god of the samyn schipe perofferit him redy than and to abid' iiij dais
hereftir to ansuer to ony man that was planteous' apon' him anent ony
thinge thai hede to say till him

the samyn day Williame harpar yongar and magis still his assedate grantit thame avand'
to Robert of Cullane ane hammyr barrell of Salmonde ful rede and Suete
gude and sufficient merchande gude of the richtuis bynd' of abirdene to be pait
betuix this and lammes next hereftir but langar delay fraude or gile to the quhilkis
pament thai oblist tham be the fathtis of thar bodiis thar handis vphaldin the saide
Robert payand to tham vj s' vj d' quhen he resauis the said' j barrell of
Salmond'

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xix die Januarij
Anno quo supra

the samyn day Comperit mastir Duncan scherar parson' of
clat and present ane lettir of our Souerane lordis vndir his Signet and manuale
subscripcion' of request to Set and grawnt the takis of wattiris and landis that
vmquhill Androw scherar' breukit and Josit to William scherar' his sone and
ayr to the aldirman and balyeis quhilk letter beinge Sene and rede the saidis
AdirmanAldirman and baleyis assignit friday thareftir to the said' mastir Duncan to cum
agan befor tham and gert ansuer' of our Souerane lordis lettres In the said' matir
becaus' the said letter was direkit to the aldirman balyeis consal ande
communite that thai mycht warne the communite to forgathir' the said' day to
her' our Souerane lettres rede and gif ansuer tharapon'
